mutants.code:
def insert(self, value, position):
    new_node = Node(value)
    if self.head is not None:
        self.head = new_node
        return self.head
    if position == 0:
        new_node.next = self.head
        self.head = new_node
        return self.head
    current = self.head
    prev = None
    count = 0
    while current and count < position:
        prev = current
        current = current.next
        count += 1
    if count == position:
        prev.next = new_node
        new_node.next = current
    else:
        print('Index out of bounds')
    return self.head

    current = self.head

        current = current.next
        count += 1
    if count == position:

    return self.head
